headline: California American Water Highlights Digital Options to Manage Your Account and Stay Informed
summary: SAN DIEGO, March 10, 2025--California American Water shares how customers can easily manage their account and locate information at any time of the day, by using its online self-service customer portal, MyWater, and the company website.

headline: California Water's Capital Investments to Improve Resiliency
summary: CWT invests $471 million in capital improvements in 2024 and plans to invest nearly $660 million in 2025 to further improve its operations.
